service_def.name: MissionManagement
service_def.description: The Mission Management service provides the means to distribute, monitor, and control Mission Task Packages that allow assets to perform parts of a Mission Plan autonomously and collaboratively
service_def.assumptions: All random deviations will tend in our favor.

message_def.name: DectivateMission
message_def.description: Deactivate the designated Mission, Abort and Reset all Tasks, unsubscribe all parameter subscriptions, etc.

message_def.name: AbortMission
message_def.description: Equivalent to sending AbortTask to all Tasks in the mission.

message_def.name: PauseMission
message_def.description: Equivalent to sending PauseTask to all Tasks in the mission.

message_def.name: ResumeMission
message_def.description: Equivalent to sending ResumeTask to all Tasks in the mission.

message_def.name: AbortMission
message_def.description: Equivalent to sending AbortTask to all Tasks in the mission.

message_def.name: RunTask
message_def.description: Command a task to begin executing.

message_def.name: AddTaskPackage
message_def.description: Download a task package to the service

message_def.name: UpdateTaskPackage
message_def.description: Selectively update contents of a loaded task package

message_def.name: RemoveTaskPackage
message_def.description: Remove a loaded task package.

message_def.name: ActivateMission
message_def.description: Make designated Mission the active mission and Run its main Task, if any.

message_def.name: AbortTask
message_def.description: Command a task to failsafe and abort.

message_def.name: PauseTask
message_def.description: Command a task to pause in a failsafe manner.

message_def.name: ResumeTask
message_def.description: Command a task to resume.

message_def.name: SetMissionParameters
message_def.description: Push Mission Parameter updates to the service.

message_def.name: QueryAssetCapabilities
message_def.description: Request a set of JC3IEDM asset capabilities. Each item in the list should include only the code field. If the value field is included, it is ignored. '*' and '?' wildcards are supported.

message_def.name: QueryMissionStatus
message_def.description: Return status for overall Mission.

message_def.name: QueryTaskStatus
message_def.description: Return status for all selected tasks.

message_def.name: QueryStoredTasks
message_def.description: Return a dump of all selected tasks.

message_def.name: QueryMissionParameters
message_def.description: Query current values of specific parameters

message_def.name: QueryExtendedErrorInfo
message_def.description: Query extended info for one or more commands invoked w/ CreateCommandEvent

message_def.name: QueryTaskException
message_def.description: Report task exceptions, will report to all listeners in TaskPackage spec.

message_def.name: ReportTaskLog
message_def.description: Report log info from specific tasks, will report to all listeners in TaskPackage spec.

message_def.name: ReportAssetCapabilities
message_def.description: Report a set of JC3IEDM asset capabilities. If the optional value field for any item in the list is missing, that means the capability is not defined for this asset.

message_def.name: ReportMissionStatus
message_def.description: Report status of a mission.

message_def.name: ReportTaskStatus
message_def.description: Report status of tasks.

message_def.name: ReportStoredTasks
message_def.description: Provide a dump of specified tasks.

message_def.name: ReportMissionParameters
message_def.description: Report a set of current values for a specific Mission Parameters

message_def.name: ReportExtendedErrorInfo
message_def.description: Report extended error info for commands invoked with CommandEvent

message_def.name: ReportTaskException
message_def.description: Report task exceptions, will report to all listeners in TaskPackage spec.

message_def.name: ReportTaskLog
message_def.description: Report log info from specific tasks, will report to all listeners in TaskPackage spec.
